location.zh-cn: 中国汉口、汉阳、安徽、江西、湖南等地

description.zh-cn: 1900年八国联军时期，由唐才常等人发起的旨在推翻慈禧、建立君主立宪政府的武装起事，但因计划泄露及内部资金问题而迅速失败。
description.en: An armed uprising initiated by Tang Caichang and others during the Boxer Rebellion in 1900, aimed at overthrowing Empress Dowager Cixi and establishing a constitutional monarchy. It failed quickly due to leaked plans and internal funding issues.

description.zh-cn: 自立军起义的目标及镇压方。
description.en: The target and suppressor of the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 由唐才常组织的团体，是自立军起义的核心力量，前身为“正气会”。
description.en: An organization founded by Tang Caichang, which was the core force of the Self-Support Army Uprising. Its predecessor was the 'Zhengqi Hui' (Righteousness Society).

description.zh-cn: 清末主张君主立宪的政治派别，是自立军起义的重要参与力量。
description.en: A political faction in the late Qing Dynasty advocating for constitutional monarchy, and a key participant in the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 清代长江流域的民间秘密社团，参与了自立军起义。
description.en: A secret society active in the Yangtze River basin during the Qing Dynasty, which participated in the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 由孙中山创立的革命组织，部分成员及力量支持了自立军起义。
description.en: A revolutionary organization founded by Sun Yat-sen, some of whose members and forces supported the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 时任湖广总督，为清政府镇压了自立军起义。
description.en: The Viceroy of Huguang at the time, who suppressed the Self-Support Army Uprising for the Qing government.

description.zh-cn: 自立军起义的主要发起人和总指挥，事败后被张之洞杀害。
description.en: The main initiator and commander-in-chief of the Self-Support Army Uprising, who was executed by Zhang Zhidong after its failure.

description.zh-cn: 维新派领袖之一，担任自立军副总指挥，负责海外募款。
description.en: A leader of the Reformists, who served as the deputy commander of the Self-Support Army and was responsible for overseas fundraising.

description.zh-cn: 维新派领袖，负责为自立军起义募集资金，但最终未将款项汇出，导致起义计划受挫。
description.en: A leader of the Reformists responsible for fundraising for the Self-Support Army Uprising, but his ultimate failure to remit the funds thwarted the uprising plan.

description.zh-cn: 兴中会领袖，对自立军起义表示支持，并提供了部分人员。
description.en: The leader of the Revive China Society, who supported the Self-Support Army Uprising and provided some personnel.

description.zh-cn: 清末实际统治者，自立军起义的主要目标。
description.en: The de facto ruler of the late Qing Dynasty and the main target of the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇帝，戊戌政变后被慈禧软禁。自立军起义的目标是营救他并建立君主立宪制。
description.en: The Emperor of the Qing Dynasty, placed under house arrest by Cixi after the Wuxu Coup. The Self-Support Army Uprising aimed to rescue him and establish a constitutional monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 为应对义和团运动而组成的国际军队。其入侵华北造成清廷权力真空，为自立军起义提供了时机。
description.en: An international military force formed in response to the Boxer Rebellion. Its invasion of North China created a power vacuum in the Qing court, providing an opportunity for the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 自立军前军统领，在大通率先发难，但因孤军奋战而失败。
description.en: Commander of the Self-Support Army's vanguard. He initiated the uprising in Datong but failed due to fighting alone.

description.zh-cn: 自立军前军统领，与秦力山一同在大通发难。
description.en: Commander of the Self-Support Army's vanguard, who initiated the uprising in Datong along with Qin Lishan.

description.zh-cn: 哥老会龙头，负责联系会党力量支持自立军起义。
description.en: A leader of the Gelaohui, responsible for liaising with secret societies to support the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中国留学生之父，支持维新与革命。在上海“中国议会”上被选为议长，是自立军起义的重要策划者。
description.en: Known as the 'Father of Chinese students studying abroad,' he supported both reform and revolution. He was elected chairman of the 'China Congress' in Shanghai and was a key planner of the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 1900年7月在上海由维新派、革命党人等召开的会议，决定组织自立军发动起义。
description.en: A meeting held in Shanghai in July 1900 by reformists, revolutionaries, and others, which decided to organize the Self-Support Army to launch an uprising.

description.zh-cn: 由自立会及各方力量组成的武装部队，旨在执行自立军起义计划。
description.en: An armed force composed of the Self-Support Society and other factions, intended to carry out the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 日本组织，支持了唐才常组织自立会及后续的起义活动。
description.en: A Japanese organization that supported Tang Caichang in organizing the Self-Support Society and the subsequent uprising.

description.zh-cn: 自立会的前身，由唐才常在东亚同文会支持下秘密组织。
description.en: The predecessor of the Self-Support Society, secretly organized by Tang Caichang with the support of the East Asian Common Culture Society.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后发动政变，囚禁光绪帝，终止戊戌维新，导致维新派转向更激进的武装斗争。
description.en: A coup launched by Empress Dowager Cixi, imprisoning the Guangxu Emperor and ending the Hundred Days' Reform, which pushed the reformists towards more radical armed struggle.

description.zh-cn: 推翻清朝统治的革命。自立军起义的失败，促使部分维新派人士转向革命，被视为辛亥革命历史的转捩点之一。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew the Qing Dynasty. The failure of the Self-Support Army Uprising prompted some reformists to turn to revolution, and it is considered one of the turning points in the history of the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，在维新派与革命派合作期间进行破坏，导致孙文与康有为关系破裂。
description.en: A late Qing official who undermined the cooperation between reformists and revolutionaries, leading to the breakdown of relations between Sun Yat-sen and Kang Youwei.

description.zh-cn: 日本浪人，积极撮合孙文与康有为合作，但因刘学询的计谋而在新加坡入狱。
description.en: A Japanese rōnin who actively tried to broker cooperation between Sun Yat-sen and Kang Youwei, but was imprisoned in Singapore due to Liu Xuexun's scheme.

description.zh-cn: 清末重要军事及政治人物，在戊戌政变中向荣禄告密，导致维新派失败。
description.en: An important military and political figure in the late Qing Dynasty. He informed on the reformists to Ronglu during the Wuxu Coup, leading to their failure.

description.zh-cn: 清末重臣，保守派代表，从袁世凯处获悉维新派计划后协助慈禧发动戊戌政变。
description.en: A powerful conservative minister in the late Qing Dynasty who, after learning of the reformists' plans from Yuan Shikai, assisted Empress Dowager Cixi in launching the Wuxu Coup.

description.zh-cn: 自立军中军统领，起义失败后与唐才常一同被捕并被杀害。
description.en: Commander of the Self-Support Army's central column, arrested and executed along with Tang Caichang after the uprising failed.

description.zh-cn: 唐才常是自立军起义的主要发起人和总指挥。
description.en: Tang Caichang was the main initiator and commander-in-chief of the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 在上海中国议会后，决定以自立会为基础成立自立军。
description.en: After the China Congress in Shanghai, it was decided to establish the Self-Support Army based on the Self-Support Society.

description.zh-cn: 自立军起义旨在推翻以慈禧为首的清政府。
description.en: The Self-Support Army Uprising aimed to overthrow the Qing government led by Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 时任湖广总督张之洞在汉口包围并逮捕了唐才常等起义领导人，并于次日将他们处决，彻底扑灭了起义。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong, then Viceroy of Huguang, surrounded and arrested uprising leaders including Tang Caichang in Hankou, executing them the next day and completely crushing the uprising.

description.zh-cn: 张之洞下令将唐才常等起义领袖在武昌紫阳湖畔斩首。
description.en: Zhang Zhidong ordered the execution of Tang Caichang and other uprising leaders by the Ziyang Lake in Wuchang.

description.zh-cn: 康有为承诺的起义款项迟迟未到，导致自立军粮饷不继，被迫推迟起义，最终事败。
description.en: The funds promised by Kang Youwei failed to arrive, causing a lack of supplies for the Self-Support Army, forcing a postponement of the uprising and contributing to its eventual failure.

description.zh-cn: 八国联军入侵华北，导致清廷权力真空和统治危机，为自立军起义创造了时机。
description.en: The invasion of North China by the Eight-Nation Alliance created a power vacuum and a crisis of governance for the Qing court, providing an opportunity for the Self-Support Army Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 起义的目标是推翻慈禧的统治。
description.en: The uprising aimed to overthrow the rule of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 起义的目标是营救光绪皇帝，并建立君主立宪政府。
description.en: The uprising aimed to rescue the Guangxu Emperor and establish a constitutional monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 自立军起义的失败激发了维新党人同情革命，使许多人放弃改良幻想，是革命历史的转捩点之一。
description.en: The failure of the Self-Support Army Uprising inspired sympathy for the revolution among reformists, causing many to abandon illusions of gradual reform, making it a turning point in revolutionary history.

description.zh-cn: 唐才常是张之洞的门生，曾就读于张之洞创办的两湖书院。
description.en: Tang Caichang was a protégé (mensheng) of Zhang Zhidong and had studied at the Liang-Hu Academy founded by Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 唐才常是谭嗣同的生前挚友。
description.en: Tang Caichang was a close friend of Tan Sitong.

description.zh-cn: 东亚同文会支持唐才常秘密组织“正气会”（后改名自立会）。
description.en: The East Asian Common Culture Society supported Tang Caichang in secretly organizing the 'Zhengqi Hui' (later renamed the Self-Support Society).

description.zh-cn: 在上海愚园召开的中国议会决定以自立会为基础成立自立军，并发动起义。
description.en: The China Congress, held at Yu Garden in Shanghai, decided to establish the Self-Support Army based on the Self-Support Society and launch an uprising.

description.zh-cn: 容闳在上海中国议会上被投票选为议长。
description.en: Yung Wing was elected as the chairman at the China Congress in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 因刘学询策划的“日本刺客”事件，康有为与孙文反目成仇，不再与革命党人来往。
description.en: Due to the 'Japanese assassin' incident plotted by Liu Xuexun, Kang Youwei became enemies with Sun Yat-sen and ceased contact with the revolutionaries.

description.zh-cn: 刘学询设局陷害宫崎滔天，向新加坡当局放出假消息，导致宫崎滔天被捕入狱。
description.en: Liu Xuexun framed Miyazaki Tōten by spreading false information to the Singapore authorities, leading to Miyazaki's arrest and imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧发动戊戌政变，囚禁光绪帝，终止了戊戌维新运动。
description.en: Cixi launched the Wuxu Coup, imprisoning the Guangxu Emperor and terminating the Hundred Days' Reform movement.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯将维新派捕杀慈禧的计划告知荣禄，导致戊戌政变发生，维新派失败。
description.en: Yuan Shikai revealed the reformists' plan to capture Cixi to Ronglu, leading to the Wuxu Coup and the failure of the reformists.
